channel.title: What's your opinion of various genres?
channel.description:
I hope you're ready to read, because i got a lot to type. For the sake of organisation i'm going to spit my opinions up into genres of music. but i will have a ***bold*** heading for ones i want to emphasise. Ok here we go.
***Future Bass*** - Ugh, I dont hate it, but i dont love it, theres just too much of it in the auxy community. Trap - Nah, im not really a fan. same case as future bass. Dubstep - Mmmm this ones tricky, i dont really listen to it, but i'll tolerate it. i enjoy some songs but im not an active listener. ***Brostep*** - This is the kind of music people mix up with dubstep (this is the kind of music Skrillex makes) and i prefer it to dubstep, but again, not an active listener. Classical - I know nothing about it so i cant make an opinion. Rock/Alternative Rock - I'm mostly only familliar with some bands because my brother is a fan, i like it though. ***Deep House*** - I hate it with all my heart and soul. ***Liquid Drums and Bass*** - I hate it a little less than Deep House. Trance - I like it, its the kind of music i'm into ***Russ*** - "Wait, what the hell is Russ?" I hear you say, Russ is a "Genre" mage by literally only one person, an artist named Vexento: https://www.youtube.com/user/Vexento/featured Because he couldn't describe his music, he is one of my favourite artists. Just wanted you guys to know about him. Old Rap - Like Eminem, yeah its fine, i know a couple songs. Modern rap - Like Lil' Pump, Nope nope nope. The only person that can successfully pull this genre off is probably Post Malone, and i don't even like *HIS* songs, anyone with the words "Gucci" or "Lil" I refuse to listen to. Chiptune - I like video games, i like electronic, its good in my books. Country - eeh, ill listen to it of someone else puts it on, but i wont choose it. Hip-Hop - Yeah its good. Electro - Yes. This is by FAAAAAR one of my favourite genres, i like a good melody, and some sweet chords combines with bleeps and bloops. A cappella - its a bit funny, but i like it Death Metal - nah ill stay away from that for now. Electro swing, yeah its fine. Funk - eeh. K-pop - I dont understand J-pop - (See previous answer) Ragtime - its cool.
Ok, thats all ill do for now, if you have any questions about any specific genres, feel free to ask me.

item.title: What's your opinion of various genres?
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
Vocal chops for me are also a hit or miss. I like it more when vocals or vocal chops are complementary to the track, meaning that they don’t take the focus. But I’ll be open-minded; I’m not on any personal vendetta against vocal-based songs. Here’s a vocal-based song I really like, and here’s a vocal-chop-based song that I adore as well.

Read full topic

item.title: What's your opinion of various genres?
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
I don’t know what I don’t like in terms of genres, as there’s bound to be songs from each corner of the musical spectrum that’d sound good done well. I do know however that I do prefer electronic music without vocals. Tunes with vocals are a hit/miss for me, and as such, pop and hip hop aren’t usually my style (unless I’m very enebriated ).

Read full topic

item.title: What's your opinion of various genres?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Most of my opinions on genre align with this wonderful guide: http://techno.org/electronic-music-guide/

In all seriousness I am really bad with genres, in terms of what I like I don’t listen to a lot of rap because for me it’s all the same but in recent times i’ve been proven wrong with what rap can really accomplish. I think I tend to align with more traditional styles of musical composition, which is why I used to classify myself as Downtempo but as @akabillposters showed me I was rather off with my assessment. Nowadays, I write more traditional EDM as best I can.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your opinion of various genres?

item.title: What's your opinion of various genres?
item.dc:creator: Norfleet
item.description:
To be honest, I don’t really have opinions about most genres. I enjoy ambient music (one of my favorite YouTube channels: https://soundcloud.com/ambientmusicalgenre), and while I don’t particularly love too many other genres, I don’t really have any reason to dislike them.

However, there are some exceptions.

  • House: I don’t find this particularly creative. Feel free to prove me wrong, of course – I’m definitely not a connoisseur or anything.
  • Heavy Metal: It hurts my ears, and just overall sounds very noisy and irritating.
  • Nightcore: I don’t actually know too much about this. It seems like it’s just taking other people’s work and putting stuff onto it. Remixing. Whatever. There’s a funny video about it by AcesToAces as well.
  • Mumble Rap: AKA 2017 rap, whatever you want to call it. I feel like there isn’t much work put into it – I don’t really hate it, but it’s just… my opinion.

Read full topic
item.source: What's your opinion of various genres?
